Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Aortic Diseases/Aortic Aneurysm/Aortic Aneurysm, Thoracic
Cardiovascular Diseases/Vascular Diseases/Aneurysm/Aortic Aneurysm/Aortic Aneurysm, Thoracic
Record.Description: An abnormal balloon- or sac-like dilatation in the wall of the THORACIC AORTA. This proximal descending portion of aorta gives rise to the visceral and the parietal branches above the aortic hiatus at the diaphragm.
